turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Lifeguard (comics).
turn.1: What is the main article about?
turn.2: Lifeguard (comics)  Lifeguard (Heather Cameron) is a fictional character, a superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics.
turn.3: What team is the character part of?
turn.4: The character is primarily associated with the X-Men.
turn.6: Created by writer Chris Claremont and artist Salvador Larroca, she first appeared in "X-Treme X-Men" #6 (December 2001).
turn.8: She is a mutant, gaining whatever superhuman abilities are needed in a life-threatening situation.
turn.9: Is there anything else you can tell me about the character?
turn.10: She and her brother Slipstream were briefly members of the segment of X-Men featured in the series "X-Treme X-Men." Heather and Davis Cameron were a lifeguard and a surfer, respectively, living in Surfers Paradise in Australia.
turn.11: Is the character's family a villain?
turn.12: Unbeknownst to them, their father is an underworld crime lord known as Viceroy, and upon his death they were attacked.
